data.title: Leuven PhD Lectures in Economics
data.meta_description: The Leuven PhD Lectures in Economics is a series of academic lectures hosted by KU Leuven’s Department of Economics. The lectures, given by leading scholars from academia, are designed for PhD students and researchers in the field of economics, and they aim to provide insights into the latest research developments and methodologies in various subfields of economics.
data.text:
